meanings.sent1: The promissory note was a written assurance of payment.
meanings.sent2: Her promissory tone assured me that she would keep her word.
meanings.sent3: The promissory gesture of a pinky promise sealed their friendship.
meanings.sent4: The sky's colors made a promissory display of a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's smile was a promissory sign of a fun class ahead.

meanings.definition: A written promise to pay a specified sum of money at a specified time
meanings.sent1: He signed the promissory note to borrow money for his car.
meanings.sent2: The promissory agreement outlined the terms of the loan clearly.
meanings.sent3: The promissory paper fluttered in the wind, almost like a kite.
meanings.sent4: The promissory document was as valuable as gold in his eyes.
meanings.sent5: The promissory contract was a lifeline during his financial crisis.
